capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's beard is really growing in, isn't it? I mean, he's been working hard to keep up with his grooming routine. It's impressive how quickly it's accumulated over the years.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's car is definitely one of his most prized possessions. Vernon's car is his, and I'm pretty sure he loves driving it.
